item.title: HackTheBox - Simple Encryptor
item.author: me@loganthompson.de (Logan Thompson)
item.description: Type: Challenge Category: Reversing Difficulty: Very Easy Solves: 3655 In this post we will be looking at a very simple encryptor and how to break it!
